[[=]]
**《[[span class="ruby"]]대[[span class="rt"]]大[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]만[[span class="rt"]]滿[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]주[[span class="rt"]]洲[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]제[[span class="rt"]]帝[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]국[[span class="rt"]]國[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]이[[span class="rt"]]異[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]상[[span class="rt"]]常[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]판[[span class="rt"]]辦[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]공[[span class="rt"]]公[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]실[[span class="rt"]]室[[/span]][[/span]] [[span class="ruby"]]대[[span class="rt"]]隊[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]가[[span class="rt"]]歌[[/span]][[/span]]》**
[[/=]]
[[=]]
[[div class="vpoem"]]
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]巍[[span class="rt"]]외[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]巍[[span class="rt"]]외[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]滿[[span class="rt"]]만[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]洲[[span class="rt"]]주[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（높고 큰 만주는##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]是[[span class="rt"]]시[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]我[[span class="rt"]]아[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]家[[span class="rt"]]가[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]園[[span class="rt"]]원[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|곧 나의 집이니）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]。
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]齊[[span class="rt"]]제[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]心[[span class="rt"]]심[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]努[[span class="rt"]]노[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]力[[span class="rt"]]력[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（마음 모아 노력해##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]護[[span class="rt"]]호[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]民[[span class="rt"]]민[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]千[[span class="rt"]]천[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]萬[[span class="rt"]]만[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|천만 백성 지킨다）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]。
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]瑰[[span class="rt"]]괴[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]麗[[span class="rt"]]려[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]滿[[span class="rt"]]만[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]洲[[span class="rt"]]주[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（크고 아름다운 만주는##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]如[[span class="rt"]]여[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]我[[span class="rt"]]아[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]父[[span class="rt"]]부[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]母[[span class="rt"]]모[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|내 부모와 같으니）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]盡[[span class="rt"]]진[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]顯[[span class="rt"]]현[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]帝[[span class="rt"]]제[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]德[[span class="rt"]]덕[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]榮[[span class="rt"]]영[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]光[[span class="rt"]]광[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（임금의 성덕 영광되게 높이자）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]！
[[/div]]
[[div class="vpoem"]]
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]廣[[span class="rt"]]광[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]大[[span class="rt"]]대[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]滿[[span class="rt"]]만[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]洲[[span class="rt"]]주[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（넓고 큰 만주에##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]吾[[span class="rt"]]오[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]等[[span class="rt"]]등[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]所[[span class="rt"]]소[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]忠[[span class="rt"]]충[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|우리 충성 바쳐）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]。
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]不[[span class="rt"]]불[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]畏[[span class="rt"]]외[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]犧[[span class="rt"]]희[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]牲[[span class="rt"]]생[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（희생 두렵지 않아##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]身[[span class="rt"]]신[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]死[[span class="rt"]]사[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]猶[[span class="rt"]]유[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]榮[[span class="rt"]]영[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|죽으면 오히려 영광）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]。
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]滿[[span class="rt"]]만[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]日[[span class="rt"]]일[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]同[[span class="rt"]]동[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]心[[span class="rt"]]심[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|(만·일이 한마음에##,,[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]掃[[span class="rt"]]소[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]盡[[span class="rt"]]진[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]妖[[span class="rt"]]요[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]氛[[span class="rt"]]분[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|요사한 기운 쓸어버려）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]
[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="ruby"]]共[[span class="rt"]]공[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]建[[span class="rt"]]건[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]王[[span class="rt"]]왕[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]道[[span class="rt"]]도[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]樂[[span class="rt"]]낙[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]土[[span class="rt"]]토[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]],,##B5B5B5|（함께 왕도낙토를 세우자）##,,[[/span]][[/span]]！
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
----

이 곡의 작사・작곡자는 불명이다. 현 시점에서 처음 불려진 것으로 생각되는 것은 [[span class="ruby"]]만주국이상판공실[[span class="rt"]]이마메아(IMAMEA)[[/span]][[/span]] 출범 당시 판공실 처장 [[span class="ruby"]]타[[span class="rt"]]田[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]나카[[span class="rt"]]中[[/span]][[/span]] [[span class="ruby"]]우[[span class="rt"]]右[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]쿄[[span class="rt"]]京[[/span]][[/span]]가 부른 것이다. 그러나 본 곡의 가사는 [[span class="ruby"]]한[[span class="rt"]]漢[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]어[[span class="rt"]]語[[/span]][[/span]]였기 때문에, 부호부대 대원 및 전 대원을 중심으로 조직된 판공실에서는 크게 받아들여지지 않았다. 본 곡의 지위는 부호부대 대가로 대신되었으며, 실제로 불리는 것은 공식 석상으로만 한정되었던 것으로 알려져 있다.

당시 판공실에 소속되었던 [[span class="ruby"]]장[[span class="rt"]]張[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]전[[span class="rt"]]荃[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]방[[span class="rt"]]芳[[/span]][[/span]]의 회고록에 따르면, 본 곡의 마지막 구절은 원래 「[[span class="ruby"]]만[[span class="rt"]]滿[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]일[[span class="rt"]]日[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]동[[span class="rt"]]同[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]심[[span class="rt"]]心[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]], [[span class="rt"]]，[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]발[[span class="rt"]]發[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]양[[span class="rt"]]揚[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]도[[span class="rt"]]道[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]덕[[span class="rt"]]德[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]], [[span class="rt"]]，[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]공[[span class="rt"]]共[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]건[[span class="rt"]]建[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]왕[[span class="rt"]]王[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]도[[span class="rt"]]道[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]낙[[span class="rt"]]樂[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]토[[span class="rt"]]土[[/span]][[/span]][[span class="ruby"]]![[span class="rt"]]！[[/span]][[/span]]」였다. 그러나 사령부에 심사를 신청한 뒤 현재 판으로 고쳐졌다. 그는 그 이유가 판공실의 [[span class="ruby"]]‘이상징후’에[[span class="rt"]]"변칙성"의 일본 표현[[/span]][[/span]] 대한 자세를 강조하는 목적이 있었다고 지적했다. 그리고 남쪽의 변칙부대 이자메아가 2차대전기에 전개한 「요괴대대」 계획을 비꼰 것이라는 통찰도 했다. 다만 그가 제시한 설을 보강할 만한 자료는 아직 발견되지 않았다.
author: Salamander724
